question:
You are a student living in university accommodation. The heating has not worked for some time. Write a letter to the management. In your letter Explain why you complain;

Describe the problems Tell what you want them to do
text: I am writing to complain about the heating in the student dormitory.

As you know, the weather is getting extremely cold this winter. However, the heating has not worked properly for one month. The room temperature is only 10 degrees celsus. I got a cold and fever, and had to rest in bed for one week and missed several classes.

I contacted the maintenance office two weeks ago. A staff came by and checked the heaters. He replaced some vents and guranteed that the heating problem had been fixed. It worked at first, however, the heater stopped working after two days.

I am requesting the management department to solve the problem of heating as soon as possible. This issue led to sickness and influenced my course work. If the heating could not be fixed, then I will ask to change to another room with proper heaters.
